segments.text: Taylor , you're sweating up a storm !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your boyfriend , Bryan , wanted to toss the football . I think he wore me out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you look a little shaky . And pale . You seriously need some time in the sun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're like the tenth person to say that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're just worried about you , Taylor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whatever . I wish people would just leave me alone !
segments.speaker: S2
